function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Climate change results in extended geographical range of disease vectors","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deforestation leads to cross-contact of pathogens through animal emigration","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insect range expansion and phenological changes impact disease transmission","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unknown source of infection in 41% of the cases within the first 30 days","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gaps in surveillance and slow response","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Systemic gap in the health sector: shortage of resilience","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased occurrence of typhoons, hurricanes, and extreme weather conditions leading to loss of lives, properties, and Change","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of infectious diseases due to limited transportation networks and early shutdowns","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of food chains and scarcity of resources due to climate change impacts","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 transmission in disease prevention efforts.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rising air pollution as lockdown eases","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on cars
